mapper.select: SELECT ta.id, ta.email, ta.password, tr.name AS role, ta.role_id, ta.is_verified, ta.is_active FROM tb_distributor_account ta JOIN tb_role tr ON ta.role_id = tr.id WHERE ta.email = #{email} AND ta.is_verified = TRUE
